price: Kuhimidiwa ni kwa Mwenyezi Mungu, ambaye amemteremshia mja wake Kitabu, wala hakukifanya kina upogo.
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عِوَجَاۜ
footnotes: Kuhimidiwa, yaani kusifiwa na kushukuriwa kwa wema, anastahiki Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu, ambaye amemteremshia mja wake, Muhammad, hii Qur'ani. Na wala hakujaalia kuwa ndani yake kipo chochote cha dosari, kilicho kwenda kombo na kuacha usawa. Bali ndani yake mna Haki tupu, isiyo na shaka yoyote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī anzala ʿalā ʿabdihi al-kitāba walam yajʿal lahu ʿiwajā
